Subject: Concern Over Delays in Payroll Processing

We have received several complaints about delayed payroll processing. A potential system glitch might be the cause You can reach me at omar.hassan@secure.net.. We have reviewed the software and employee data but have not yet found a solution. My name is Elena Ivanova.
